question.text: The correct statement among the following is:

options.text: <math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math> is planar and less basic than <math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math>

<math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math> is pyramidal and more basic than <math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math>

<math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math> is pyramidal and less basic than <math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math>

<math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math> is planar and more basic than <math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math>

solution.text:
lp of N in NCH33 is free to donate while in NSiH33 lp is involved in back bonding so it is not easy to donate hence it is less basic.

Due to back bonding it is planar and sp2 hybridised.
